column4: I agreed. / I felt sick. / I fell asleep.

column3: We were ripped off. {{c1::We paid too much.}}
column4: We were attacked. / We paid too much. / Our clothes were torn.

column3: I told them off. {{c1::I was annoyed with them.}}
column4: I was annoyed with them. / I was satisfied with them. / I told them to go away.

column3: They don't get on. {{c1::They don't have a good relationship.}}
column4: They are lazy. / They don't have a good relationship. / They don't know each other.

column3: I carried on with my work. {{c1::I continued working.}}
column4: I started working. / I stopped working. / I continued working.

column3: He was showing off. {{c1::He was trying to impress people.}}
column4: He was joking. / He was trying to impress people. / He was telling lies.
